title: Dwarf
entryLore: Dwarves are a stout and resilient people, forged in the depths of mountains and tempered by centuries of toil. Their oldest tales speak of valorous battles against giants and subterranean horrors, inspiring a culture that celebrates the little overcoming the mighty. Dwarves are known for their masterful craftsmanship, their stubbornness, and their unyielding loyalty to clan and kin.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have [[darkvision|Darkvision]] with a range of 120 feet.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.description: You have [[resistance|Resistance]] to [[poison_damage|Poison damage]]. You also have [[advantage|Advantage]] on [[saving_throw|saving throws]] you make to avoid or end the [[poisoned_condition|Poisoned condition]].

traits.name: Dwarven Toughness
traits.description: Your [[hit_points|Hit Point]] maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again whenever you gain a level.

traits.name: Stonecunning
traits.description: As a [[bonus_action|Bonus Action]], you gain [[tremorsense|Tremorsense]] with a range of 60 feet for 10 minutes. You must be on a stone surface or touching a stone surface. You can use this a number of times equal to your [[proficiency_bonus|Proficiency Bonus]], regaining all uses on a [[long_rest|Long Rest]].

### Dwarf Lineages
Members of the Dwarf race typically belong to one of the following lineages, which provide additional benefits:

*   [[hill_dwarf|Hill Dwarf]]
*   [[duergar|Duergar]]
